chat_log.speaker: customer
chat_log.message: I have noticed that my energy bill spikes every summer, is there anything I can do to reduce it?

chat_log.speaker: agent
chat_log.message: Are you using a lot of air conditioning during the summer?

chat_log.speaker: customer
chat_log.message: Yes, I have to keep my house cool

chat_log.speaker: agent
chat_log.message: Have you considered using a programmable thermostat?

chat_log.speaker: customer
chat_log.message: I have not, what is that?

chat_log.speaker: agent
chat_log.message: A programmable thermostat allows you to set the temperature of your home at different times of the day, so you can save energy when you are not home

chat_log.speaker: customer
chat_log.message: That sounds like a good idea, I will look into it

chat_log.speaker: agent
chat_log.message: Great, let me know if you have any other questions

chat_log.speaker: customer
chat_log.message: hi I tried to use a programmable thermostat for my air conditioner in summer but it didn't work

chat_log.speaker: chatbot
chat_log.message: I'm sorry to hear that, what seems to be the problem?

chat_log.speaker: customer
chat_log.message: I set the temperature during the day to 25 degrees whilst I am in the office, and 20 degrees when I am at home, but my bill is still high

chat_log.speaker: chatbot
chat_log.message: is the bill higher during the period you are at home?

chat_log.speaker: customer
chat_log.message: no, it is higher during the day when I am at work

chat_log.speaker: chatbot
chat_log.message: It sounds like either it is very hot during the day or the thermostat is not working properly. What is the temperature outside during the day?

chat_log.speaker: customer
chat_log.message: it is around 35 degrees

chat_log.speaker: chatbot
chat_log.message: It sounds like the air conditioner is working hard to keep the house cool even when you are not home. You may want to consider setting the temperature higher during the day or turning it off when you are not home

chat_log.speaker: customer
chat_log.message: I will try that, thank you
